title: BRIEF-Nomura Research Institute To Float Australian-Dollar Bonds As Soon As Mid-March - Nikkei
text: March 8, 2018 / 5:13 PM / Updated 43 minutes ago BRIEF-Nomura Research Institute To Float Australian-Dollar Bonds As Soon As Mid-March - Nikkei Reuters Staff March 8 (Reuters) - Nikkei * NOMURA RESEARCH INSTITUTE WILL FLOAT AUSTRALIAN-DOLLAR BONDS FOR JAPANESE INVESTORS AS SOON AS MID-MARCH - NIKKEI * CONSULTING FIRM AFFILIATED WITH NOMURA HOLDINGS TO ISSUE 5-YEAR AUSTRALIAN-DOLLAR BONDS; AMOUNT TO BE RAISED, COUPON RATE NOT YET FINALIZED - NIKKEI‍​ Source text : [ID: s.nikkei.com/2FBUZud ] Further company coverage:
